Mashable - Full Time, New York City (Remote available)

Mashable is looking to hire developers/devops candidates to work on our Velocity platform - effectively a web crawler that feeds our data science and NLP engines. Key areas of expertise would include JRuby, Java, Python, message brokers (RMQ in our case), Postgres/Mongo (tokumx)/Elasticsearch, Puppet, and AWS. We deploy on RHEL and CentOS.

If you're a Ruby developer who isn't just a Rails developer and can deal with data that doesn't fit into RAM, then we'd like to talk to you.

Email resumes or further questions to cheald@mashable.com, or you can submit your resume directly at http://mashable.theresumator.com/apply/Te5NYa/Product-Senior...
